Misty, I agree we really need to drop this and get on with the purpose of t=
he group, but this Koenig guy below continues to make accusations and keep =
this angst going. I personally have no idea what this Magic Cafe thing is h=
e is now accusing people of.=A0 Maybe he's a newbie or something and doesn'=
t understand forum decorum, so maybe another warning would be sufficient? I=
'd hate to see a newbie get banned because he got his emotions up.

--- On =
Tue, 8/18/09, David Koenig <floridajakeblues@...> wrote:

From: David=
 Koenig <floridajakeblues@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: NOTICE TO A=
LL : Enough already!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, August 18, =
2009, 2:59 PM






=A0




    
                  The same group attacked =
the Magic Cafe.They were all booted out!

On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 2:43 PM, =
Lisa <lawlis1969@yahoo. com> wrote:













=A0




    
             =
     --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@ ...> wrote:

>
=

> I am getting pretty tired of a few whos sole purpose in this group is to=
 provoke Frank and other members into negativity. If it continues you and y=
our fake nicknames will be removed. Your attempts to promote your "other gr=
oup" will be viewed as spam and deleted as such. They may go unnoticed by t=
he group but they dont go unnoticed by me. Funny how its always just that o=
ne person/group that you promote while every post you make is not about you=
r research or anyone elses but rather a  play on words meant to provoke som=
eone. You should run a quick background check on your friend the owner of t=
hat "other group" you may find you know less than you thought you did. You =
know who you are. And so do I.


> 

> As for Frank, he knows I dont always=
 agree with what he says. He knows I definitely dont agree with the namecal=
ling or public venting. Having said that. Frank is the founder of this grou=
p. As such he will ALWAYS have a voice here. Those who dont like that or do=
nt agree are free to move on.


> 

> If you are here to learn about EVP-IT=
C, Frank's Box, or share your research, by all means do so. If you are here=
 for another purpose then dont be surprised when you go to sign in and find=
 you are no longer a member here.


> 

> Misty

>



Hi Misty,



I joined=
 this group a long time ago...pretty much a silent observer. I don't even r=
ead all of the emails I get on updates. I thought when I saw the whole name=
 calling thing it was some sensitive person whining about a spirit saying c=
olorful things to them...then I read a few. ARE THEY SERIOUS. Please know t=
here are many people who agree with you and Frank and agree whole heartedly=
 you should delete the faint of heart...LOL. Can you imagine how they would=
 react to a simple BOO from a voice from beyond? LOL...what fools.





 

=
